overview: It's never too late to turn your wife into a real sex addict! Anissa is a sublime, serious and very submissive woman. When her naughty best friend decides to get fucked by a handsome black man in front of her, she tells everything to her husband... But he doesn't have the reaction she was expecting! He even proposes her to behave like a good nympho and to fuck all his friends...
title: The Good Wife
